para_sentences.para_0: Minimum spanning tree has wide applications in graph problems. Being confident with approaching and solving graph problems will help us attempt complex problems with ease.
para_sentences.para_1: In question 1, you will draw a minimum spanning tree (MST) for a graph. (MLO1)
para_sentences.para_2: In question 2, you will implement the MST algorithms that we discussed in the exploration. (MLO2 & MLO3)
para_sentences.para_3: In question 3, you will implement a graph traversal algorithm. (MLO1, MLO2 and MLO3)

para_sentences.para_0: Download the assignment questions from this assignment file.
You will turn in the submission files via Canvas and Gradescope.
para_sentences.para_1: All your answers other than python code files will be turned in through thisCanvas assignment in a pdf file.
para_sentences.para_2: The python files to be submitted on Gradescope:
